skills.name: Know and use the vocabulary of prime numbers and composite numbers

explanations.D: "Composite" means "not prime". Are all of these numbers prime?
"Composite" means "not prime". Are all of these numbers prime?

explanations.A: 9 is composite as 9 = 3 × 3, so 9 cannot be a prime factor of anything.
explanations.B: 9 is not a prime number, it's a square number.
explanations.C: To be a prime factor, a number must be prime.
explanations.D: If a number if not prime, then it is composite.

explanations.B: 2 is both prime and a factor of 10.
explanations.C: A number cannot be both prime and composite.
explanations.D: 2 is either prime or composite. 2 is a factor of 10 as 10 ÷ 2 = 5.

explanations.A: The only factors of 31 and 1 and 31.
explanations.B: A prime number is only divisible by 1 and itself. Try dividing 33 by 2, 3 or 5 say.
explanations.C: A prime number is only divisible by 1 and itself. Try dividing 35 by 2, 3 or 5 say.
explanations.D: A prime number is only divisible by 1 and itself. Try dividing 39 by 2, 3 or 5 say.

explanations.A: Does 41 have any factors other than 1 and 41?
explanations.C: Does 61 have any factors other than 1 and 61?
explanations.D: Does 71 have any factors other than 1 and 71?

explanations.A: A prime number is only divisible by 1 and itself. Try dividing 21 and 23 by some smaller numbers.
explanations.B: 21 = 3 × 7, but 23 only has factors of 1 and itself.
explanations.D: Does 23 have any factors other than 1 and 23?

explanations.A: A prime number is only divisible by 1 and itself. Try dividing 27 and 29 by some smaller numbers.
explanations.B: 27 = 3 × 9, but 29 only has factors of 1 and itself.
explanations.D: Does 29 have any factors other than 1 and 29?

explanations.A: 1 is neither prime nor a multiple of 5 (it is a factor of 5).
explanations.B: 5 is the only prime divisible by 5.
explanations.D: Almost, but have a look at each of the options in turn.

explanations.A: 3 is not a multiple of 9, it is a factor of 9.
explanations.D: As 9 itself is not prime, no multiple of it can be prime.
